timeline.message: [#83] csv reader in item description factory
[#83] added csv in input / output graph
label to field processor can handle links

timeline.bodyText: btw: ItemDescriptionFactory has loads of if-statements without braces. 🙃
timeline.author: jpgoelz

replies.bodyText: Right. I've been looking into the wrong file.
replies.author: bonndan

timeline.bodyText:
Personally, I would go with List.of("csv"), which is also immutable.
See Singleton List Showdown: Collections::singletonList Vs. List::of (tl;dr: "Both Collections::singletonList and List:of are great choices for creating single-element lists. [...] I recommend going with List:of for its ease of use, readability, and better-documented immutability.)
timeline.author: jpgoelz

timeline.bodyText: Because it is a sentence with a period: Mapping...
timeline.author: jpgoelz

timeline.bodyText: This class contains if-statements without braces.
timeline.author: jpgoelz

timeline.bodyText:
Why are not all test methods public?
The names of the methods don't really give away, what they are testing. Maybe change method names or at least use @DisplayName("Expect this and that").
timeline.author: jpgoelz

replies.bodyText: Test methods do not need to be public afaik. It's more a habit of good old PHP times.
replies.author: bonndan

timeline.bodyText:
IntelliJ complains: "Statement lambda can be replaced with expression lambda."
What are your thoughts on that, @bonndan, @Matthimatiker?
timeline.author: jpgoelz

replies.bodyText: I'd say this does not matter in tests, and here it is perhaps better to work with the system under test as usual.
replies.author: bonndan

timeline.author: jpgoelz

timeline.bodyText: add a blank line after this
timeline.author: jpgoelz

timeline.bodyText: Why do these return mxGraph, if the return value is never used?
timeline.author: jpgoelz

replies.bodyText: This maybe remained from earlier examinations of the graph. As always, I'd say this is not worth refactoring, since it is just test code.
replies.author: bonndan

timeline.bodyText: Not one of the changes, but there is a typo on line 166: lanscape.
timeline.author: jpgoelz

timeline.bodyText: I like spaces between i, + and 1. :)
timeline.author: jpgoelz
jpgoelz

timeline.bodyText: Imho static, albeit private methods should go to the top of a class, even before public methods. What's your opinion @Matthimatiker?
timeline.author: jpgoelz

replies.bodyText: My opinion(!) is: public stuff comes first. You are however free to change it.
replies.author: bonndan
